name: group_created
definition: The event is emitted anytime a new group is added to a course by an end user or API request.
trigger: Triggered when a new group is created.

schema.account_id: The Canvas id of the group's account.
schema.context_id: The Canvas id of the group's context.
schema.context_type: The type of the group's context ('Account' or 'Course').
schema.group_category_id: The Canvas id of the group category.
schema.group_category_name: The name of the group category.
schema.group_id: The Canvas id of the group.
schema.max_membership: The maximum membership cap for the group.
schema.uuid: The unique id of the group.
schema.workflow_state: The state of the group. (available, deleted)

metadata.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/73.0.3683.103 Safari/537.36
